title: Μόσχα: Επιμένει με μια φωτογραφία το ISIS - Ιδού ποιοι έκαναν την επίθεση, είναι μαχητές μας
cleaned_sentences: Moscow: Heis insists on the ISIS - Behold who made the attack, they are our fighters Source of Photography: Internet // The Islamic State responds, in essence, to the editor of Russia Today, who stressed that "it is not the work of ISIS but of Ukrainians, the bloodshed" The Islamic State terrorist organization has released Saturday noon, via a post by its Amaq news network on Telegram, a photo where he argues the four perpetrators of the attack in Russia, which killed at least 143 people.

In the post - which suggests that the perpetrators have not been identified - it is reported that the attack on Russia was committed in the context of the "raging war" between the Islamic State and the countries fighting Islam.

"Islamic State fighters attacked a large gathering of Christians in the city of Krasnogorsk, on the outskirts of the Russian capital, Moscow, killing and injuring hundreds and causing great disasters in the place before they were safely withdrawn on their bases," he said.
Concert hall and three started shooting people, while the fourth set fire to the space. "

In this way, the Islamic State responds, in essence, to the editor -in -chief of Russia Today, who emphasized earlier that "it is not the work of ISIS, but of the Ukrainians, the bloodthirsty in the concert venue".
🇷🇺 Big Breaking- #Moscowattack: ISIS VIA AMAQ News Releases Statement and Group Picture of the 4 Terrorists That Carried Out The Terrorist Attack in Moscow, #russia.
